biotools.summary: Online tool for estimation of melting temperatures for sets of oligonucleotides and positioning of oligomers within sets of aligned sequences. Oligomer positioning on sequences is displayed graphically.

bioschemas.name: OligoHeatMap
bioschemas.summary: Online tool for estimation of melting temperatures for sets of oligonucleotides and positioning of oligomers within sets of aligned sequences. Oligomer positioning on sequences is displayed graphically.
